sentences.sentence: He may be unaware of his irritability and surprised when someone calls attention to it.
sentences.translation: 他可能没有意识到自己的易怒，当有人提醒他注意时，他会感到惊讶。

sentences.sentence: Acute exposure to lead may impact mice behavior altering such as irritability, hyperkinesis, retardation of learning and memory, etc.
sentences.translation: 急性铅暴露可能影响小鼠的行为改变，如易怒、运动亢进、学习和记忆迟钝等。

sentences.sentence: Your irritability will lead to family squabbles.
sentences.translation: 你的烦躁会引发家庭矛盾。
